Articles.Content:
Hi! I wanted to come introduce myself because my execution launch date is coming up soon.

And I wanted to share my pictures of my second trip to Minimus.

http://imgur.com/a/nSnKW

The Space Program is proud to report that only one crew has been lost in deep space since the introduction of the version 1.5 rocket control system! (Apparently the voters don\'t mind gruesome deaths as long as there is something left to bury.)

Thanks for the great game and keep up the good work all you coders and modders.

Cheers!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

What you can\'t see in the picture, because kerbals can\'t blink, is that they are actually sleeping.
Oh my god. Who\'s flying the ship?!
